name: Paradigm (itch) (iMattRoman)
description:
2D/3D Puzzle Platformer - After finding a mysterious glowing rock, you realize it has given you the power to switch between dimensions.  Each dimension is slightly different but you can travel between them and bring objects back and fourth that may help you in the other dimension.  Harness the power of the crystal to solve puzzles, explore caves and inevitably escape from the prison which once held you.

This was a student game that I completed in 2019, the objective of the project was to create a side-scroller  (any genre).
